title: (x) Dark Horse - ITC Berkeley Oldstyle {Mark S}
content: ![this is for the company i work for, i am new here and NO ONE knows the type face of their own logo!!](http://web.archive.org/web/20050817000610im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39753.jpg)
author: hello_caleb

comments.content: This would be [ITC Berkeley](http://web.archive.org/web/20050817000610/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-berkeley-old-style/itc-berkeley-oldstyle-medium/testdrive.html?s=DARK%a0HORSE&p=48), stretched and letterspaced. Looks like they modified the R as well.
